ConfigFileName_Comment: Name to identify the config file - should match the config file name without the 'Config'
Instance_Comment: Name of the source instance - drives the generated index name.  Can be the same as the ConfigFileName, but simple is best.  Include a number for multi-instance.  ex. 'glb1'
SourceType_Comment: Used to select the source adapter to apply, only set this if you know what you are doing.  Recommend using a sample config to start from that already has this set.
BaseAddress_Comment: The base URL address of the source API
Timeout_Comment: Interval of seconds between API requests
ApiKey_Comment: The key used to authenticate to the API. This is created manually from the GitLab GUI settings page.
BatchLimit_Comment: The number of records to pull from the API at one time. GitLab has a 100 maximum per page/batch.
GroupNamespace_Comment: This is the first folder in the hierarchy of folders/sub-folders to get to projects
IssueSeverityMap_Comment: Maps the source severity name to one of the Saltminer severity names
